title: Algebraic characterization of the Wess-Zumino consistency conditions in gauge theories
abstract: A new way of solving the descent equations corresponding to the Wess-Zumino consistency conditions is presented. The method relies on the introduction of an operator $\delta$ which allows to decompose the exterior space-time derivative $d$ as a $BRS$ commutator. The case of the Yang-Mills theories is treated in detail.
